data.name: Keybinding.CreateHorizontalPanel.Description
data.value: Create a new horizontal panel around the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.CreateStackPanel.Description
data.value: Create a new stack panel around the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.CreateVerticalPanel.Description
data.value: Create a new vertical panel around the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.DecreaseHeight.Description
data.value: Decrease the height of the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.DecreaseWidth.Description
data.value: Decrease the width of the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.IncreaseHeight.Description
data.value: Increase the height of the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.IncreaseWidth.Description
data.value: Increase the width of the focused window

data.name: Keybinding.MoveDown.Description
data.value: Move the window next to the window below

data.name: Keybinding.MoveFocusDown.Description
data.value: Focus the window below the current window

data.name: Keybinding.MoveFocusLeft.Description
data.value: Focus the window to the left of the current window

data.name: Keybinding.MoveFocusRight.Description
data.value: Focus the window to the right of the current window

data.name: Keybinding.MoveFocusUp.Description
data.value: Focus the window above the current window

data.name: Keybinding.MoveLeft.Description
data.value: Move the window next to the window on the left

data.name: Keybinding.MoveRight.Description
data.value: Move the window next to the window on the right

data.name: Keybinding.MoveUp.Description
data.value: Move the window next to the window above

data.name: Keybinding.PullWindowUp.Description
data.value: Move the window out of its containing panel

data.name: Keybinding.RefreshWorkspace.Description
data.value: Force a change-detection cycle of the whole workspace

data.name: Keybinding.SwapDown.Description
data.value: Swap the current window with the window below it

data.name: Keybinding.SwapLeft.Description
data.value: Swap the current window with the window on its left

data.name: Keybinding.SwapRight.Description
data.value: Swap the current window with the window on its right

data.name: Keybinding.SwapUp.Description
data.value: Swap the current window with the window above it

data.name: Keybinding.ToggleFloatingMode.Description
data.value: Toggle floating mode for the focused window

data.name: General.AllocateNewPanelSpace
data.value: Reserve empty space in new panels

data.name: General.AllocateNewPanelSpace.Description
data.value: New panels have will have empty space until a second window is added.

data.name: General.RunsAsAdmin.AdminDescription
data.value: FancyWM is currently running with administrator privileges and can manage all of your windows.

data.name: General.RunsAsAdmin.NonAdminDescription
data.value: FancyWM cannot manage windows from elevated processes unless it is run as administrator. Enable this option and restart FancyWM to fix this.

data.name: General.ShowContextHints.Description
data.value: Shows the list of available keybindings after 1s of inactivity. The command pop-up stays on-screen for longer, but you can close it with

data.name: General.ShowFocusDuringAction.Description
data.value: Highlights the focused window when the command pop-up is shown.

data.name: General.ShowStartupWindow
data.value: Show the startup window at program startup

data.name: General.SoundOnFailure
data.value: Play a sound when an action fails

data.name: Displays.MultiMonitorSupport
data.value: Enable tiling on all connected displays

data.name: About.Copyright
data.value: Copyright © 2022 Vesko Karaganev. All Rights Reserved.

data.name: About.Credits.Description
data.value: Made possible by the following awesome open-source software.

data.name: Advanced.Scripting.Description
data.value: Scripting support is still in preview.

data.name: Displays.MultiMonitorSupport.Description
data.value: Restart FancyWM for changes to take effect!

data.name: ErrorMessageBox.Caption
data.value: A fatal error has occurred in FancyWM!

data.name: ErrorMessageBox.Description.CheckForSolution
data.value: FancyWM will now close. If this issue persists, please check for a solution and/or open a bug report on

data.name: ErrorMessageBox.Description.SubmittingALog
data.value: By submitting a log you can help diagnose the issue. The log file contains a history of the events leading up to the crash. Sensitive information is obfuscated.

data.name: Keybindings.DirectMode.About
data.value: Registers the keybinding as a system hotkey, allowing it to be used without the Activation hotkey. The keybinding must use at least one modifier key (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, Win).

data.name: Keybindings.DirectMode.FailModes
data.value: Windows will not allow FancyWM to register a hotkey that is already used by it or another application.

data.name: Rules.ClassIgnoreList.Description
data.value: Floating mode will be automatically enabled for windows with a matching window class. The matching is not case-sensitive and you may use regular expressions.

data.name: Rules.ProcessIgnoreList.Description
data.value: Floating mode will be automatically enabled for windows belonging to one of the processes. Enter one process name per line, excluding the ".exe" extension (e.g. "explorer"). The matching is not case-sensitive and you may use regular expressions.

data.name: Startup.InSystemTray
data.value: You can always find it in the System Tray.

data.name: Startup.Paragraph1
data.value: To change the layout for the focused window, press the activation keybinding, [⇧ Shift] and [⊞ Win], and once the toast popup is visible, press [H], [V] or [S].

data.name: Startup.Paragraph2
data.value: You can also hover over the top border of the focused window to change the layout.

data.name: Startup.ShowThisWindow
data.value: Show this window when FancyWM starts

data.name: Messages.AskForReview
data.value: If you are, please take a moment to review it on the Microsoft Store. Thank you for your support!

data.name: Messages.CannotBeResizedToFit
data.value: The window cannot be resized to fit!

data.name: Messages.DirectHotkeyRegistrationFailed
data.value: Could not register one or more keybindings as system hotkeys!

data.name: Messages.NothingToDo
data.value: Nothing to do on this desktop.

data.name: Messages.StoreCommunicationFailed.Description
data.value: Communication with the Microsoft Store failed with code

data.name: Messages.UpdateCheck.UpdateAvailable
data.value: A new version of FancyWM is available! Download the latest update in the background?

data.name: Messages.UpdateCheck.UpdateDownloadComplete
data.value: Update download completed! Restart FancyWM to install it?

data.name: TilingError.InvalidTarget
data.value: The target panel does not support this operation!

data.name: TilingError.NestingInStackPanel
data.value: Stack panel cannot contain other panels!

data.name: TilingError.TargetCannotFit
data.value: Cannot fit in the target panel!

data.name: Messages.WindowsVersionNotSupported.Caption
data.value: Your version of Windows is not supported!

data.name: Messages.WindowsVersionNotSupported.Description
data.value:
FancyWM tries to use the internal Windows Virtual Desktop Service, which is unsupported by Microsoft. This message can be disabled in Settings.
It appears that in your version of Windows, Microsoft has changed the VDS interface, and FancyWM cannot detect your virtual desktops.
If you are running a supported non-Insider Windows build and you see this message, please select Yes to report it.

data.name: General.NotifyVirtualDesktopServiceIncompatibility
data.value: Show warning on Virtual Desktop Service failure

data.name: General.NotifyVirtualDesktopServiceIncompatibility.Description
data.value: FancyWM tries to use the internal Windows Virtual Desktop Service, which is unsupported by Microsoft. FancyWM can warn you if it is unsupported on this version of Windows.
